highlights: Drilling System R&D Group: Investigated market needs and technical barriers for next-generation drillships through international collaboration. Proposed and validated novel drilling system layouts, and developed digital mockups to demonstrate arrangement efficiency and energy performance.

Robotics R&D Group: Developed a portable articulated welding robot from prototype to pre-commercial deployment on shipyard blocks. Refactored and debugged the real-time robot controller (C, RTOS/Windows). Designed and integrated mechatronic accessories; implemented device interfaces for field deployment.
